(OOC: Sorry I took so long replying. Something was wrong with my computer, 
it wouldn't let me access my e-mail.)

Tavatron:

Tavatron looked from one end of the bridge to the other, hesitating for a 
few moments. Finally she dropped to all fours as she reverted to her black 
and brown beast mode. Tavatron made her way past the row of 'R chambers and 
stopped beside Dinobot.

Of all the things that were lost to her, of all the things that were 
uncertain, there was one thing she was sure of... she would sooner face a 
fleet of Preds than tell anyone that she couldn't hunt. She could track an 
enemy blindfolded, but for the life of her couldn't follow the simplest 
animal trail. By Primus, she had tried. She just couldn't do it!

Tavatron growled softly at the thought of being humiliated yet again. 
Tavatron looked at Dinobot, avoiding eye contact. This time it was she who 
didn't want him gazing into her optics. Tavatron sighed, perhaps she had 
gotten better over the years...

"Yes, I know of such a spot. Follow me." Tavatron took off at a brisk jog, 
all of a sudden she didn't feel like running anymore.
